metadata.title: CVE-2016-7903 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Dotclear before 2.10.3, when the Host header is not part of the web serverrouting process, allows remote attackers to modify the password resetaddress link via the HTTP Host header.

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
